data.1: I CALL TO witness the Fig and the Olive,
data.4: That We created man of finest possibilities,
data.5: Then brought him down to the lowest of the low,
data.6: Except those who believe and do the right, for whom there is reward undiminished.
data.7: Who should then make you deny the Judgement after this?
data.8: Is not God the most equitable of all judges?
